title: Average price for properties for sale in Rome , Italy 2019 , by area
yAxis: Price in euros per square meter
summary: Centro_Storico has the highest Price euros of all TV and radio Area .
The host of CBS Area radio 's `` The Centro_Storico Show `` has accumulated around 7817 million square meter in his years of commentating .

With Area leagues such as the NFL averaging millions of television viewers per year and events like the World Cup ranking among the most watched broadcasts in the world , it 's easy to see how the Area that discuss these events stand to benefit greatly from their close proximity to the events and the athletes themselves .

data.Area: Corso Francia Vigna Clara Fleming Ponte Milvio

gold: The statistic shows the average price for houses , apartments and residential real estate for sale in selected areas of the Italian city of Rome as of December 2019 . According to the data , the sale price in the historic city center ( Centro Storico ) amounted to over 7.8 thousand euros per square meter .
